TopicTitle: [11/26/15 Update] Say Hello to the Light-Green Group!

Articles.Content:
Also, congratulations to Exothermos on becoming the latest member of the light green group!

Well done!

Dear Everybody,

I was planning on updating the Group today, but then I realized something...

I'm currently one point off having another light-green pip added to my collection. In addition, the Forum-goer Beale is currently about seven units of Reputation away from becoming the latest member of the Group; he'll probably be at the 500 mark later today or tomorrow.

I know I shouldn't ask for Reputation, but can you please give a bit to either or both of us, so that the information shown isn't out-of-date only a day after I update it?

I'll try to get around to updating the Group tomorrow or the day after. I'm really busy in real life, but I'll try to carve out some time.

Thanks

-Upsilon
Try it now XD

Ok Upsilon. Just to let you know I got another one today. My dry wit is paying off. Also I changed my title.

Also... Why does this list exist anyway?
I bumped up Beale to light green, welcome!

I only have 45 points of rep

Must... Reach... Light green!

I bumped up Beale to light green, welcome!

[kingvoice]Let the list be updated![/kingvoice]

I only have 45 points of rep

Must... Reach... Light green!

protip, build awesome stuff then spam it across the forums.

That's what Zekes (and me )does.

protip, build awesome stuff then spam it across the forums.

That's what Zekes (and me )does.

That's pretty much it... although "build awesome stuff" ain't the easiest...

That's pretty much it... although "build awesome stuff" ain't the easiest...

yup
heh, upsilion now has 5 light green, but according to his own thread he only has 3.

heh, upsilion now has 5 light green, but according to his own thread he only has 3.

he's about to update it soon - last time was in December. We both had 3.

Also... Why does this list exist anyway?

I think Upsilon originally made it as a sort of "who's who" of high rep posters on the forum, so that newcomers could get an idea of why some posters have a lot of rep. The thread has grown to be more congratulatory to posters who crest 500 points of rep, which is a bit of harmless fun and recognition.

So...congrats on your second light green pip!
Time to raise the bar I say...

Time to raise the bar I say...

Nooo don't do that! :'( I'm almost there.

Hmm maybe time to restart K-drive development... that got me about 150 rep last time!
Still eagerly awaiting four bar recognition in the list.

Still eagerly awaiting four bar recognition in the list.

He's gonna update it soon.
finally 5 bars! just 100 points to go.....

Congratulations to Beale, modder extraordinaire, for making the Light Green Group!

Well done, you deserve it!!
I have only 1 bar

Hullo

I am rather fond of this new little 'blip'
Rune got Six light green pips!

Rune got Six light green pips!

When this is updated it will show this. There are three users with 6 now I think.

I've updated the Group. Let me know if you spot any errors.

Red Iron Crown's right, it takes a lot of time to do this. This time, it took me about thirty-five minutes, which is quite a long while for me (I generally get less than an hour on the computer per day).

Welcome to the Light-Green Group's list, everyone. It's nice to have you here.

Oh, and I updated the Group a little too late to take into account a certain member of the Dark-Red Group, who has since been positive-repped to oblivion, thank goodness. Sorry.

-Upsilon

Edited January 31, 2015 by UpsilonAerospace
I don't seem to remember the delightful commentary on each person, thank you for adding that. (he even remembered my "99% stock" days)
